Name: Lincoln Club Cooler
Ingredients: 60 ml Light gold rum (1-3 year old molasses column)
Instructions: POUR ingredients into ice-filled glass and gently stir.
Review: Basically 'a rum and ginger ale Highball ' but Lincoln Club Cooler has more of a ring to it.
History: Adapted from a recipe originally published in George J. Kappeler's 1895 Modern American Drinks . Kappeler's original recipe called for St. Croix rum.
Nutrition: One serving of Lincoln Club Cooler contains 174 calories
